array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_look_good_suggest
array.item: Create a comfortable environment for better sleep
Good sleep habits contribute to overall health
Let go of your worries before bed
Empty your mind before you sleep
Good sleep helps improve your work performance

array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_need_improve_suggest
array.item: Avoid eating or drinking too much before bedtime
Focus on your breathing, it can help you fall sleep
Play some soft music to lull you to sleep
Exercise regularly to improve the quality of your sleep

array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_very_good_suggest
array.item: Good sleep can improve your mood
Embrace each new day with a refreshed body and mind
A regular sleeping schedule can help boost your energy levels
A good night's sleep will help you tackle tomorrow's challenges
